text: The Women's 400 metre freestyle competition at the 2019 World Championships was held on 21 July 2019.ScheduleStart list Defending champion Katie Ledecky lost after holding a 0.62 second lead over Ariarne Titmus entering the final 50 meters. This was Ledecky's first loss in a major international 400 meter freestyle competition.https://olympics.nbcsports.com/2019/07/21/katie-ledecky- ariarne-titmus-world-swimming-championships/amp/ ==Records== Prior to the competition, the existing world and championship records were as follows. ==Results== ===Heats=== The heats were held at 11:22.Heats results {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
